original_text: The next king may be a wise man, or he may be a foolish man. Nobody knows! But all the things that I used my wisdom and hard work to get will belong to him. All this has no purpose. The next king may be a wise man, or he may be a foolish man. Nobody knows! But all the things that I used my wisdom and hard work to get will belong to him. All this has no purpose.
korean_text: 그 사람이 지혜자일지, 우매자일지야 누가 알랴마는 내가 해 아래에서 내 지혜를 다하여 수고한 모든 결과를 그가 다 관리하리니 이것도 헛되도다

sentences.original_text: The next king may be a wise man
or he may be a foolish man
that I used my wisdom and hard work to get
